#summary Mine REST API Reference

= Key =

  * _iid_ = itemId, integer > 0
  * TID = tagId, integer > 0
  * _rid_ = relationId, integer > 0
  * _rvsn_ = relationVersion, integer > 0
  * _cid_ = commentId, integer > 0
  * _fmt_ = "xml" | "json"
  * _key_ = structure element name, eg: "relationName", camelcase, case-sensitive


= Item API =

|| GET || /api/item/_iid_ || read-item-data ||
|| GET || /api/item._fmt_ || list-items ||
|| POST || /api/item._fmt_ || create-item ||
|| DELETE || /api/item/_iid_._fmt_ || delete-item ||
|| GET || /api/item/_iid_._fmt_ || read-item ||
|| POST || /api/item/_iid_._fmt_ || update-item ||
|| DELETE || /api/item/_iid_/_key_._fmt_ || delete-item-key ||
|| GET || /api/item/_iid_/_key_._fmt_ || get-item-key ||

|| GET || /api/relation/_rid_/_key_._fmt_ || get-relation-key ||
